long_description: This general-purpose Seals Adventurer 2.2 spray skirt is great for moderate conditions and helps keep water out while protecting legs from harsh sunlight. Durable midweight nylon packcloth is polyurethane coated for water resistance. Strong bungee-powered rim grip system secures skirt firmly to cockpit coaming. Front webbing grab loop with handle assists with entry and fast wet exits. Tensioned deck stay creates a convex bend in fabric so water runs off, rather than collecting and pooling on top the skirt. Removable elastic shoulder straps secure skirt and keep tunnel tensioned. Tunnel waist is adjustable for a secure fit via a webbing drawcord and buckle adjustment. Double-stitched construction with sealed seams ensures long-lasting wear and water resistance. Reflective piping on deck and logo enhances visibility in low light.
short_description: This general-purpose Seals Adventurer 2.2 spray skirt is great for moderate conditions and helps keep water out while protecting legs from harsh sunlight.
